name: grassy-terrain
caption: Grassy Terrain

effect.short: For five turns, heals all Pokémon on the ground for 1/16 max HP each turn and strengthens their []{type:grass} moves to 1.5× their power.
effect.full:
For five turns, heals all Pokémon on the ground for 1/16 their max HP each turn and strengthens their []{type:grass} moves to 1.5× their power.

Changes []{move:nature-power} to []{move:energy-ball}.

flavorText:
The user turns the ground to grass for five turns.
This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a
little every turn and powers up Grass type-moves.
